mapper.insert: insert into message(sessionId, fromId, content, createTime) values(#{sessionId}, #{fromId}, #{content}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select m.messageId, m.sessionId, m.fromId, u.username as fromName, m.content, m.createTime from message m join user u on m.fromId = u.userId where m.sessionId = #{sessionId} order by m.createTime

select m.messageId, m.sessionId, m.fromId, u.username as fromName, m.content, m.createTime from message m join user u on m.fromId = u.userId where m.sessionId = #{sessionId} and m.content like concat('%', #{query}, '%') order by m.createTime
select content from message where sessionId = #{sessionId} order by createTime desc limit 1

select m.messageId, m.sessionId, m.fromId, u.username as fromName, m.content, m.createTime from message m join user u on m.fromId = u.userId where m.sessionId in (select sessionId from message_session_user where userId = #{userId})
and m.content like concat('%', #{query}, '%')
order by m.createTime desc
